data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 2,882,500 people living in Y.S.R..

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Y.S.R., Andhra Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 31,708 believers in Y.S.R. to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 2,850,792 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: God, guide the 31,708 believers in Y.S.R. to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Y.S.R., Andhra Pradesh, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 2,850,792 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Vaddar (Hindu traditions) people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Vaddar (Hindu traditions) people know you.
Spirit, make the church in Y.S.R., Andhra Pradesh, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Y.S.R., Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Y.S.R., let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

location.name: Y.S.R.
location.people_groups_list: Balija (Hindu traditions), Karigar, Borewale, Nagartha, Raya Rawat
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Balija (Hindu traditions) (1,759,000), Karigar (200), Borewale (100), Nagartha (54,000), Raya Rawat (2,500)
